Publications

Group highlights

At the end of this page, you can find the full list of publications. All papers are also available on PURE.

A Digital One Health framework to integrate data for public health decision-making

Proposing a Digital One Health (DOH) framework for integrating data in public health decision-making.

CJ Redman-White, K Loosli, V Qarkaxhija, TN Lee, G Mboowa, BA Wee, A Muwonge

10.1016/j.ijidoh.2023.100012

A review of the predictors of antimicrobial use and resistance in European food animal production

Paper reviewing predictors of AMU and AMR in European livestock

CJ Redman-White, D Moran, AR Peters, A Muwonge

10.3389/frabi.2023.1209552

An open-source digital contact tracing system tailored to haulage

Paper descibing THEA-GS, an open-source digital contact tracing system for the Global South tailored to haulage

A Muwonge, BA Wee, I Mugerwa, E Nabunya, CM Mpyangu, BM de C Bronsvoort, ER Ssebaggala, A Kiayias, E Mwaka, M Joloba

10.3389/fdgth.2023.1199635
